name: Avoid using obsolete "Bit Operations" statements in RPG Programs  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches all the programs having obsolete "Arithmetic Operations" statements.
output:
This report lists RPG300 programs using obsolete "Bit Operations" statements.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name
rationale: During the upgrade of the different RPG versions (V2 / V3 / ILE V4) some statements are no longer supported. Where ever in the code these statements the artifact is reported as a violation.
remediation: Try to replace this statements by the supported ones.
